comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Sadly, Stefan G. Czerkas, was killed in an automobile accident north of Palmetto, Florida, on March 17, 1999. An 18-year-old honor student at Boca Ciega High School, Stefan was en route home to St. Petersburg from Sarasota, where he was visiting a friend. [1]

comment.author: 75408986@N08
comment._content:
That is so sad.  

I used to go to Palmetto High school.
